resources.string:
The goal of this game is to guess the right combination of colors. The player only has a maximum of 12 attempts to find this combination. At each attempt, the player proposes a combination of 4 colors. 
If the combination shown is correct, the game stops. 
If the combination is incorrect, but some colors are present in the combination: 
 - If one or more colors are in the right place, red circles will indicate the number. 
 - If one or more colors are in the wrong place, white circles will indicate the number.
You have found the right combination!
You will have more luck next time!
